__e: A farmer and his family used to live here.
But not before one of 'em knifed a farmer and stole his horse.
For a moment there, I thought you were just a dumb hick - who only has sex with farm animals.
I wanted to be a farmer, just like my father before me and his father before him.
As long as I got to chauffer the little strumpet. You mind if a country boy picks up a little education?
We would rather be a peasant in a garden with a pitchfork - if that would keep you safe.
Now I want to kill them all.
You don't want to look like a peasant showing off.
